label: Welcome. You have arrived here because you are already experiencing a level of success in your business. A level big enough that it made you look up and realize that there may be opportunities to build upon that success more effectively! Caution: According to the Pareto, only 4% of small business owners are able to stop over-identifying with their business and embrace this next level; to really become objective, to understand and commit to these tools and thereby maximize your success into freedom and intentional wealth.
name: welcome

label: To what level is your business able to run without you?
name: C1S1Q1

answer_bounds.low: I work  > 40 hours a week and am responsible for many operational decisions.
answer_bounds.high: My business is able to be independent of my continued active involvement giving me real freedom and spontaneity.

label: How do you intend that the wealth and experience you are creating will benefit your community and your family? Check all that apply
name: sample

choices: Providing for my children's and grandchildren's education and housing needs is important to me.
It is important that I leave a solid inheritance for my family.
I would like to create an endowment to a college or hospital in the community
I see myself in the future mentoring young entrepreneurs
I would like to be an angel investor

label: How do you intend that the wealth and experience you are creating will benefit your community and your family? Check all that apply
name: q1
